bibl.title: Bulletin of Online Emendations to Papyri [BOEP]. Version 2.1 (January 15, 2013).
bibl.note: Emendations appearing in this bulletin have been entered online at www.papyri.info/editor/ via the Papyrological Editor (PE), and have been vetted by members of the PE's editorial board. The list contains corrections [by L. Berkes, W.G. Claytor, J. Cowey, H. Cuvigny, D. Hagedorn, P. Heilporn, D.M. Ratzan, J. Rea and A. Verhoogt] that were adopted prior to December 12, 2012. These emendations have not appeared previously in print and are presented together for ease of reference and review.
bibl.seg: Rodney Ast & James Cowey (edd.), Bulletin of Online Emendations to Papyri [BOEP]. Version 2.1 (January 15, 2013).
Heidelberg, Ruprecht-Karls-Universität Heidelberg, Institut für Papyrologie, 2013, 3 pp.

Emendations appearing in this bulletin have been entered online at www.papyri.info/editor/ via the Papyrological Editor (PE), and have been vetted by members of the PE's editorial board. The list contains corrections [by L. Berkes, W.G. Claytor, J. Cowey, H. Cuvigny, D. Hagedorn, P. Heilporn, D.M. Ratzan, J. Rea and A. Verhoogt] that were adopted prior to December 12, 2012. These emendations have not appeared previously in print and are presented together for ease of reference and review.
Ast Cowey Berkes Claytor Cuvigny Hagedorn Heilporn Ratzan Rea Verhoogt
